title: SELAH - Things My Dad Said That Made Me Rich
description: YOU CAN BE THE BEST YOU POSSIBLE! Author: Gregory S. Trent Sr.Foreword: Sandra CrouchIn this powerful book Gregory Trent helps you to self identify key areas that may need improving within your life. Using his father's quips and sayings as a roadmap, this book becomes a GPS to achieving personal richness in living. Through this book he will help you: Selah - stop and consider key sayings Self-Discover - Stop and consider your present situation and key things throughout the book Self-Coach - Put together a personal accountability plan to sustain the change The goal is that you would look at the reflection and be totally, and painfully honest with yourself. By doing so and putting together your accountability plan for your future, it will put you in the best place to be the best you that you could possibly be!
author: Gregory S. Trent Sr.
